company_description: Delzhin provides modern and integrated solutions in the supply chain, a reliable partner for your business in international trade.
sea_freight_desc: Providing FCL and LCL sea freight services from all over the world to Iranian ports and vice versa.
air_freight_desc: The fastest and most reliable way to send your shipments using reputable global airlines.
road_freight_desc: FTL and LTL road transport services to all neighboring countries, CIS, and Europe with the best rates and schedules.

home_whyus_desc: Leveraging our experience, expertise, and extensive international network, we provide reliable and efficient services to optimize your supply chain.

slide_intro_desc: The Delzhin collection, consisting of an experienced and dynamic team, leveraging a wide capacity of agencies and services, has been able to offer one of the most complete product baskets with a focus on international transport and customs clearance in the supply chain field.

story_p1: Delzhin was founded in [...] with a simple goal: to simplify the complexities of international transport. We started with a small but motivated team, and today we have become a trusted player in the logistics industry.
mission_p1: Our mission is to provide integrated, innovative, and customer-centric logistics solutions that help businesses grow in global markets. We believe in transparency, commitment, and quality every step of the way.
slide_team_title: Beyond a Service, A Strategic Partnership
slide_team_subtitle: Our expert team is the beating heart of Delzhin. We are a blend of experience, innovation, and commitment, striving every day for one goal: to provide solutions that not only move your cargo but also move your business forward.
slide_team_desc: By meticulously analyzing your needs and leveraging the latest logistics technologies, we optimize your processes and reduce costs. From initial consultation to final delivery, our experts are with you every step of the way to ensure a seamless and reliable shipping experience. For us, every project is a long-term partnership to achieve mutual success.
